Could be from Community Care or other organisations which could possibly give you some life line for the time being. OR even approach your RC for help for referral to other agencies for help.(2) Please prepare your emergency funds after you are financially not in debt. Even with insurance, you need this emergency fund to hedge against reinbursement type of medical expenses or accident insurance reinbursement claim.
